name: Clockwork Heart (NYU Game Center - High School Programs)
name_original: Clockwork Heart (NYU Game Center - High School Programs)
description:
By Jason K., Alex X., and David Z.

Set in a dark fantasy/steampunk Victorian Europe; the story follows the main character, a revered inventor who keeps a noble public appearance while secluding himself to his work. After a failed experiment, he is trapped in his own mind and is put up against a distorted abomination of his own insecurity.

Here are the controls:
WASD to move
Space to dodge toward your mouse cursor
Right Click to use the teleport ability/attack
developers: NYU Game Center - High School Programs
